state_analysis: The GPG command continues to fail due to issues with the GPG agent timing out, preventing the passphrase from being processed correctly. The encryption process cannot proceed as a result, and we are stuck at this stage.
explanation: To resolve this, we will run the GPG command again but this time without the passphrase in the command line. We will enter the passphrase interactively when prompted, ensuring that we do not encounter the timeout issue with the agent.
